title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 213 - Exceptions to the Board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 213 - Exceptions to the Board

State Regulations
§ 213.1 - Scope
§ 213.2 - Exceptions
§ 213.3 - Cross-exceptions; responses; replies
§ 213.4 - Motions for leave to file interlocutory exceptions in extraordinary circumstances
§ 213.5 - Responses to motions for leave to file exceptions
§ 213.6 - Board action on motion for leave to file exceptions
§ 213.7 - Request for extension of time
§ 213.8 - Oral argument
§ 213.9 - Amicus curiae procedure
§ 213.10 - Final board action
§ 213.11 - Enforcement of board orders

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 213

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, art. 14, §
205.5[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
